item.title: Sample blog post to learn markdown tips
item.description: There's lots to learn! - This is a demo post to show you how to write blog posts with markdown. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - it’ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/tables/etc.I also encourage you to look at the code that created this post to learn some more advanced tips about...

item.title: Camino Frances | Oct and Nov 2018
item.description: Walking the Camino - Adventure #2. Walk from St. Jean Pied de Port in France to Santiago de Compostella in Spain. I documented the trip on Strava and on Komoot [Camino Frances 2018 Komoot](https://www.komoot.com/collection/2795906/-camino-frances-2018) Camino D2 ::: {.strava-embed-placeholder embed-type=”activity” embed-id=”1923058891” data-style=”standard”} ::: ::: ::: activity Camino D3 ::: {.strava-embed-placeholder embed-type=”activity” embed-id=”1924585722” data-style=”standard”} ::: ::: ::: activity Camino D4 ::: {.strava-embed-placeholder embed-type=”activity” embed-id=”1926677889” data-style=”standard”} :::...
